name: Joined At The Head
description:
GMTK GameJam 2021

2 Player game where 2 players take over a single body, one gets the eyes and mouth, the other gets the legs and ears. Make it a day to survive the curse!

The Eye Player can keep his eye open and see the screen, the other player can not.

The Mouth Player can speak, the other player can not.

The Ears Player wears the headphones.

The Legs Player controls the character

Work together to get Larry out safe!
